Package de.oth.blocklib.renderer.loader

Class VAOTransmitter

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.renderer.loader.VAOTransmitter
public class VAOTransmitter
extends java.lang.Object
The transmitter for vertex-array-object data. Since arrays are used for the storage of vertex-buffer-object ids the number of these objects must be known. Maybe in the future a queue could be used instead of an array
Author:
Loher Florian
